description: Contains the copay category table (ECD) related group of coverages.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the coverage record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the COVERAGE table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ECD_TBL_COPAYCAT_ID
columns.description: Indicate the copay category specialty for which you want to establish a different copay/coinsurance amount. For details on the logic that POS or the Benefits Engine uses to determine the copay/coinsurance amount, please consult the help text of the "Default Copay Amount" or "Default Coinsurance Amount" items.

columns.name: ECD_TBL_COPAYCAT_ID_SERVICE_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of this benefit service type.

columns.name: ECD_TABLE_DEPT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicate the department specialty for which you want to establish a different copay/coinsurance amount. For details on the logic that POS or the Benefits Engine uses to determine the copay/coinsurance amount, please consult the help text of the "Default Copay Amount" or "Default Coinsurance Amount" items.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ECD_TABLE_AMOUNT
columns.description: Indicate the copay amount for the corresponding department specialty and/or copay category.  For details on the logic that POS or the Benefits Engine uses to determine the copay/coinsurance amount, please consult the help text of the "Default Copay Amount" or "Default Coinsurance Amount" items.

columns.name: ECD_TABLE_COINS
columns.description: Indicate the coinsurance amount for the corresponding department specialty or copay category. For details on the logic that POS or the Benefits Engine uses to determine the copay/coinsurance amount, please consult the help text of the "Default Copay Amount" or "Default Coinsurance Amount" items.
